Author: whatsupbitchezzz
Text: Merry Christmas! For some reason, whenever I hit a plateau, if I eat "normally" for a day (not stuffing my face but just eating three meals until I feel satisfied), I'll see the scale start to move again and I'll even usually wake up thinner. I think it's just that your metabolism may need a little kick in the ass or maybe it's about getting the waste moving through your system again. I think today would be the perfect day for you to give it a try and enjoy yourself, then get back on your schedule :)

Author: karasu_zoku
Text: feel this so hard. i’ve been stalled for 3 months and feel like i’m gradually losing any illusion of ever getting to my GW and magically being able to enjoy food again without guilt. that was always a fantasy, of course, but that doesn’t make it any easier to come to terms with. that i’ll keep battling this hard and being this miserable and deprived just to stay where i am. it sucks
